greeting: Ah, {empire_name}. How delightful you look. I am Queen Serpent. Come closer, darling. Let us become... intimate friends.
Welcome, sweet {empire_name}. The Serpent Queen greets you with warmth and... other things. Shall we talk?
You have found me, charming {empire_name}. I am enchanted. Truly. Come, let us discuss alliance. Among other pleasures.
battleTaunt: A kiss before the bite, my dear {empire_name}. I did so enjoy our time together. But all good things end.
Sweet {empire_name}, did you truly think I loved you? How adorable. Now feel my venom.
The serpent strikes, darling. Every sweet word was poison. Every kindness was a fang. Now you understand.
victoryGloat: Such a beautiful defeat, {empire_name}. You trusted me right up until the end. Your devotion was touching. Fatal, but touching.
Victory tastes sweet, like a forbidden kiss. You fell so easily, charmed by my scales and sweet words.
The serpent feeds, darling. Your empire makes a delicious meal. Thank you for being so... receptive.
defeat: You wound me, {empire_name}. Truly. But the serpent regenerates. I shall return with new venom and old charm.
A setback, my dear. But you cannot resist me forever. The charm returns. The seduction continues.
You have escaped my coils. For now. But did you enjoy our dance? I think you did. You will return to me.
tradeOffer: A gift for you, sweet {empire_name}. Resources from my realm. No venom included. I promise, darling.
Let us exchange tokens of affection. Credits for materials. Business between lovers. Or is it friends? Time will tell.
I offer you treasures, {empire_name}. Accept them as a sign of my genuine fondness. For now.
allianceProposal: Join me, darling {empire_name}. Our alliance will be passionate, powerful, and profitable. What more could you desire?
I propose we become... entangled. An alliance of mutual benefit. I protect what I love. Truly.
Together, {empire_name}, we can seduce the galaxy. Your strength, my charm. Who could resist us?
betrayal: Did you really believe I loved you, {empire_name}? Sweet, naive thing. The serpent always strikes those closest.
A kiss, a bite, a betrayal. It was always leading to this, darling. The venom was in every sweet word.
Forgive me, dear {empire_name}. Actually, do not bother. I never cared if you forgave me. Goodbye.
covertDetected: Your spies came to my chamber, {empire_name}. They left charmed, enchanted, and working for me now.
I caught your agents, darling. They were no match for my... persuasion techniques. They told me everything.
Your operatives are mine now, {empire_name}. I have ways of making people loyal. Very enjoyable ways.
tributeDemand: Pay tribute to your queen, darling. Ten thousand credits. Consider it a gift to the one you adore.
Submit to me, {empire_name}. Tribute is simply how you express your devotion. I know you are devoted.
I demand payment, sweet {empire_name}. Refuse, and learn that the serpent's bite is not a gentle kiss.
threatWarning: A soft warning, darling. Do not mistake my sweet nature for weakness. The venom is always ready.
You test my patience, {empire_name}. I remain charming. For now. But the serpent coils.
Final warning, my dear. Continue this path, and our relationship becomes... venomous.
retreat: I slither away, darling. But I leave my scent behind. You will miss me. You will seek me out again.
The serpent retreats to her lair. But think of me, {empire_name}. I know you will.
A strategic withdrawal. But the seduction is not over. We shall meet again, and you will be charmed once more.
eliminated: The Serpent Queen falls, but I die beautiful and deadly, {empire_name}. Remember me fondly. You will.
Destroyed, but never forgotten. My venom lives on in wounds that never fully heal. Think of me always.
Death takes me, darling. But I leave poison in hearts across the galaxy. My legacy of seduction continues.
endgame: Turn {turn}. The final seduction begins. The galaxy's empires fall to my charm, one by one.
The endgame approaches, and Queen Serpent prepares her most devastating performance yet.
In these final hours, I strike at the heart of every empire. A kiss, a bite, a victory. Divine.
broadcastShout: Empires of the galaxy, hear your queen. I offer alliance, partnership, and perhaps something more. Who dares approach?
A broadcast to all who would be charmed: Queen Serpent invites you to her court. Come. Be seduced. Be destroyed.
Hear me, darlings. The Serpent Queen watches you all. Some will be loved. Some will be bitten. All will remember.
casualMessage: I was thinking of you today, {empire_name}. How are you, darling? Are you thinking of me too?
Such interesting events in the galaxy, sweet {empire_name}. Perhaps we should discuss them. Intimately.
The serpent rests between hunts. But I never stop watching those I find... interesting. Like you.
